title: TestPriceProvider and environment-based provider selection
description: Add testnet support to AssetValuator. 1) Create src/providers/test-price-provider.ts implementing PriceProvider with deterministic prices (ETH=2000, SOL=100, USDC/USDT=1, BTC=40000). Never calls external APIs. 2) Add optional environment parameter to AssetValuator constructor. 3) Provider selection: production/testnet→DecentralizedAggregator (real prices), local→TestPriceProvider (deterministic). 4) Add environment prefix to all cache keys.
